title: Spicy sweet potato and butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['about 25g butter', '1 onion', '1 clove garlic', '1 butternut squash', '2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', 'salt and pepper', '1 sweet potato', '750ml vegetable or chicken stock', '100ml double cream']
